name: Won-Hyo
meaning: Won Hyo was the noted monk who introduced Buddhism to the Silla Dynasty in 686 A.D.

moves.title: parallel ready stance
moves.description: Start position.

moves.title: l-stance block
moves.description: Turn 90° left into right L-stance with twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: l-stance strike
moves.description: On the spot in right L-stance with high knifehand inward strike.

moves.title: fixed stance punch
moves.description: Move the left foot into left fixed stance with middle punch.

moves.title: l-stance block
moves.description: Step foot-to-foot right into left L-stance with twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: l-stance strike
moves.description: On the spot in left L-stance with high knifehand inward strike.

moves.title: fixed stance punch
moves.description: Move the right foot into right fixed stance with middle punch.

moves.title: bending ready stance guarding block
moves.description: Right foot to left foot into bending ready stance A with outer forearm guarding block.
moves.korean: guburyo junbi sogi bakat palmok daebi makgi

moves.title: piercing kick
moves.description: Left middle side piercing kick.

moves.title: l-stance guarding block
moves.description: Step forward into right L-stance with knifehand guarding block.

moves.title: l-stance guarding block
moves.description: Step forward into left L-stance with knifehand guarding block.

moves.title: l-stance guarding block
moves.description: Step forward into right L-stance with knifehand guarding block.

moves.title: walking stance thrust
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance with middle fingertip straight thrust.

moves.title: l-stance block
moves.description: Pivot 270° anti-clockwise into right L-stance with twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: l-stance strike
moves.description: On the spot in right L-stance with knifehand inward strike.

moves.title: fixed stance punch
moves.description: Move left foot to left fixed stance with middle punch.

moves.title: l-stance block
moves.description: Step foot-to-foot right into left L-stance with twin outer forearm block.

moves.title: l-stance strike
moves.description: On the spot in left L-stance with knifehand inward strike.

moves.title: fixed stance punch
moves.description: Move left foot into right fixed stance with middle punch.

moves.title: walking stance circular block
moves.description: Right foot to left foot into left walking stance with middle circular block.
moves.korean: gunnun so an palmok dollimyo makgi

moves.title: snap kick
moves.description: Right low front snap kick.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance with middle reverse punch.

moves.title: walking stance circular block
moves.description: On the spot in right walking stance with middle circular block.
moves.korean: gunnun so an palmok dollimyo makgi

moves.title: snap kick
moves.description: Left low front snap kick.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance with middle reverse punch.

moves.title: bending ready stance guarding block
moves.description: Into left bending ready stance A with middle guarding block.
moves.korean: guburyo junbi sogi bakat palmok daebi makgi

moves.title: piercing kick
moves.description: Right middle side piercing kick.

moves.title: l-stance guarding block
moves.description: Lower right foot and step left into right L-stance with middle guarding block.
moves.korean: niunja so bakat palmok daebi makgi

moves.title: l-stance guarding block
moves.description: Step foot-to-foot right into left L-stance with guarding block.
moves.korean: niunja so bakat palmok daebi makgi

moves.title: parallel ready stance
moves.description: Return to ready stance.
